titleStmt.title: Lady Alimony, or, The alimony lady an excellent, pleasant, new comedy, duly authorized, daily acted and frequently followed.
titleStmt.author: Lodge, Thomas, 1558?-1625.
Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Vere and William Gilbertson ...,

notesStmt.note: Erroneously ascribed to Thomas Lodge and Robert Greene. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
